name: Undertale: Duel of the Underground
description:
undertale platformer goes brrrrrr

wasd, 1-5 character 1

arrows, 6-0 character 2

each character has green and yellow bar

yellow means health

green means power

green bar is the power you have

power always changes by one if it's below 100

if you have more than 0 power, you can spawn attacks

if it reaches below 0, you have to wait until it refills

and yellow bar is hp bar

hp gets decreased by attacks just like in undertale

0.0.1: game released

0.0.2: added quitting option (hold x while in battle)

better saving logic

added level changing

added Papyrus as a character

better animations

fixed some bugs

added more bugs

better soul breaking animation

0.0.3: deleted wall jumping bug

added BAD TIME and dashing on sans

improved soul breaking animation

added blue soul mode on papyrus

made instructions more clearer

added sound settings

made better snow particles

added undyne as a character

fixed some bugs

added more bugs

songs used: (please don't sue me)
